extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN100 or FREN110 or (FREN101 and FREN102).
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN232 or FREN312 or FREN300.

basic.description: An introduction to business French, including discussions of related cultural and economic issues.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le français des affaires
